name: Curve25519
desc: An elliptic curve that enables X25519 key agreement and ed25519 signatures.

items.name: enum Curve25519.KeyAgreement
items.desc: A mechanism used to create a shared secret between two users by performing X25519 key agreement.

items.name: enum Curve25519.Signing
items.desc: A mechanism used to create or verify a cryptographic signature using Ed25519.
